main event: Multiple sightings of unnatural phenomena were reported in the Camp Hood, Fort Worth, Texas area between March and May 1949. The objects observed varied in size, shape, color, and speed, exhibiting behaviors such as rapid acceleration, bright flashes, and slow movement.
interesting points: The sightings were made by personnel bivouacked near the Camp Hood area, indicating that they were made by military or associated personnel.
Several sightings described unusual lights, flashes, and streaks moving at varying altitudes and speeds.
One object was described as the size of a basketball, displaying bright, fire-like colors and leaving a long trail as it moved at a very fast speed.
Triangulation by Camp Hood Artillery observation posts provided data on diamond-shaped objects exhibiting brilliant light and slow movement at altitudes of around 1500 ft.
A security agent at Killeen Base, Texas, observed two round, incandescent, and stationary objects of different sizes during daylight hours.
sighted object: Multiple unidentified objects with varying descriptions and behaviors
location: Camp Hood, Fort Worth, Texas area
